abilitiesRevealed.description: Light-speed movement via reflection off surfaces
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Allows Kizaru to move at incredible speeds, making him nearly impossible to escape from

abilitiesRevealed.description: Powerful laser beam attacks that can pierce through targets
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Used to defeat multiple Supernova captains with ease

abilitiesRevealed.description: A devastating kick delivered at the speed of light
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Kizaru's signature attack that showcases his overwhelming combat power

abilitiesRevealed.description: Can reform body from particles of light after being dispersed
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Demonstrates the near-invulnerability of Logia users

keyMoments.description: Kizaru demonstrates Yata no Kagami technique for light-speed movement
Kizaru reforms from light particles after Apoo's attack

trivia: The Pacifistas were revealed to use laser technology derived from the Pika Pika no Mi's abilities, showcasing Vegapunk's ability to replicate Devil Fruit powers mechanically.

name.japanese: リュウリュウの実 モデル:アロサウルス
name.romanized: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Moderu: Arosaurusu

abilitiesRevealed.description: Transforms the user into an Allosaurus dinosaur with enhanced strength and biting power
abilitiesRevealed.significance: First Ancient Zoan Devil Fruit shown in the series

keyMoments.description: X Drake transforms into an Allosaurus and bites the Pacifista, discovering it bleeds red blood

trivia: This is the first Ancient Zoan type Devil Fruit revealed in the One Piece anime.
Drake's observation that the Pacifista bleeds red blood provides crucial information about their biological-mechanical hybrid nature.

abilitiesRevealed.description: Transformation into a massive scarecrow-like entity with a demon face
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Shows the full transformation capability of Hawkins' Paramecia fruit

abilitiesRevealed.description: Can transfer damage to voodoo dolls that fall out when hit
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Unique damage mitigation ability though ineffective against overwhelming power

keyMoments.description: Hawkins activates Devil-Conquering Phase transformation against Kizaru

abilitiesRevealed.description: Can use body parts as musical instruments to create destructive sound wave attacks
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Unique ability that can cut and explode targets through sound

keyMoments.description: Apoo uses his sound-based abilities to attack Kizaru, appearing to sever his arm and cause an explosion

trivia: One of the most creative Devil Fruit abilities shown, turning the user's body into a living orchestra of weapons.

abilitiesRevealed.description: Allows Urouge to transform into a muscular 'Hulk mode' with enhanced strength
abilitiesRevealed.significance: Provides significant physical power boost for combat

abilitiesRevealed.description: A powerful attack technique used in transformed state

keyMoments.description: Urouge transforms and attacks the Pacifista before being shot by Kizaru

trivia: Urouge's exact Devil Fruit name has not been officially revealed as of this episode.
